channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report E-2024050298
item.description:
Report E-2024050298

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-16T15:11:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-01
  • City: CHELMSFORD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: TWO AIR PACKAGES WERE COVERED IN WHITE OPAQUE PLASTIC. PART OF THE PLASTIC WAS TORN WHICH EXPOSED GROUND LTD QTY MARKS PREPRINTED ON THE COVERED INNER FIBERBOARD BOXES. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED THAT EACH BOX CONTAINS (12) 28.4 OUNCE FLAMMABLE AEROSOL CANS OF PUR BLACK, BLACK GUN FOAM. THERE ARE NO MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER WHITE OPAQUE PLASTIC PACKAGING. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBER TO ANOTHER CONSIGNEE IN THE USA IS 1Z246E710226333781. THESE PACKAGES WERE SHIPPED FROM MA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 246E71, AMAZON MFN, 333 108TH AVE NE, BELLEVUE WA 98004-5703.
